organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine

person.name: Sinyakov, M.P., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

organization.name: Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: The monograph presents the general information about trichonematosis (cyathostoma) of horses.  Species composition of cyathostoma (syngamidae) is analyzed; distribution of the disease on the territory of the Republic of Belarus is evaluated.  Age and seasonal dynamics of cyathostoma is shown; the terms of the development of adult species and larvae of syngamidae are measured. The influence of low and high temperatures on the eggs and larvae is evaluated.  Stability of eggs and larvae exposed to pharmacological solutions is analyzed. Peculiarities of cyathostoma pathogenesis upon spontaneous infection of horses with eggs or larvae of pathogenic agents are researched. The influence of syngamidae on hematological and biochemical parameters of horses' blood is described.  The effectiveness of application of some anthelmintics against cyathostoma is analyzed.
